description.text:
Table of typematic rate from bits 5-0 command F3h.
Official IBM documentation states that bits 5-0 are split into two bitfields A and B:{bitfield:bits=8,bit[6:5]=Initial delay,bit[4:3]=B,bit[2:0]=A}Period = (8 + A) * 2{superscript:B} * 0.00417 and rate is 1 / period. Period is the amount of time between make codes.
